name: Aerodactyl

passive.name: Ancient Power
passive.effect: You may play Aerodactyl from your hand as a Basic Pokemon. If you do, place 4 damage counters on it. It has a retreat cost of 0.

attacks.name: Primal Jaw
attacks.effect: Your opponent cannot evolve the Defending Pokemon next turn.

flavor: Recently revived from fossils, these Pokemon have started inhabiting rocky mountains again. Despite their appearence in the wild, some still don't believe in ancient Pokemon.
